channel.title: CVE Feed for Semtek Informatics Software Consulting Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Semtek Informatics Software Consulting Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-7077|2024-09-04T15:22:10.985Z -- semtek%20informatics%20software%20consulting%20inc. -- semtek%20sempos
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Semtek Informatics Software Consulting Inc. Semtek Sempos allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Semtek Sempos: through 31072024.

item.title: CVE-2024-7076|2024-09-04T15:20:00.669Z -- semtek%20informatics%20software%20consulting%20inc. -- semtek%20sempos
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Semtek Informatics Software Consulting Inc. Semtek Sempos allows Blind SQL Injection.This issue affects Semtek Sempos: through 31072024.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Semtek Informatics Software Consulting Inc. Semtek Sempos allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Semtek Sempos: through 31072024.
